original_text: People will run away to Heshbon to be safe. They will be helpless as they stand outside its walls. Flames of fire will come out from Heshbon, the city where King Sihon once ruled. It will burn as far as Moab's borders. It will destroy those proud people who love to fight. People will run away to Heshbon to be safe. They will be helpless as they stand outside its walls. Flames of fire will come out from Heshbon, the city where King Sihon once ruled. It will burn as far as Moab's borders. It will destroy those proud people who love to fight. People will run away to Heshbon to be safe.
korean_text: 도망하는 자들이 기진하여 헤스본 그늘 아래에 서니 이는 불이 헤스본에서 나며 불길이 시혼 가운데 나서 모압의 살쩍과 떠드는 자들의 정수리를 사름이로다

sentences.original_text: People will run away to Heshbon to be safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 헤스본으로 도망가 안전을 찾을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will be helpless as they stand outside its walls.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성벽 밖에 서면서 무력하게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Flames of fire will come out from Heshbon,
the city where King Sihon once ruled.
sentences.korean_translation: 시혼 왕이 한때 다스렸던 그 도시에서.

sentences.original_text: It will burn as far as Moab's borders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 불은 모압의 국경까지 타오를 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will destroy those proud people who love to fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 싸움을 좋아하는 그 교만한 사람들을 파멸시킬 것이다.
